name: Compliance Copilot
description: Compliance Copilot is an AI-powered compliance auditing system that ingests regulations (GDPR, ISO-27001, SOC2, SCC, etc.) along with organizational policies and documents. It uses a hybrid retrieval pipeline with deterministic comparison heuristics to deliver clear PASS, GAP, or UNCLEAR verdicts with citations and actionable recommendations.

name: Ella (Effortless Learning & Lookup Assistant)
description: Ella is an AI agent that transforms your teamâ€™s resolved chat threads into a living FAQ knowledge base so no question has to be answered twice. It captures Slack conversations, applies RAG-powered retrieval, semantic deduplication, and AI relevance scoring to deliver instant answers, smart content curation, and seamless onboarding support.

name: Funfuse
description:
Unlike most professional platforms, FunFuse takes a completely different approach to its users.It enables the users to filter out and discover the talent and community where they can dissolve well and grow collaboratively.
It also allows mentors to show their visibility and connect on one on one video call based on video sdk.

name: My Water Chain
description:
My Water Chain is a full stack project integrated with IoT. I designed the entire project architecture using Raspberry Pi as the Brain of hardware control system and water sensors.
Raspberry Pi creates it's local server where it pings to the backend database, that was built on Python (Flask).
